description:
Fana del Moral is the future Princess consort, an extremely beautiful woman.
After a marriage proposal from the Prince of the state in the middle of the war, she is subjected to an assassination attempt conducted by the enemy. Therefore, to get her back to the mainland, the military high command has organized a secret escort mission, operated by Karino Charles, to get her past the enemy line and fly her back to the mainland of the state.
name: Fana del Moral
